content: By: Sarah Bird November 21, 2007 International Copyright on the Web: What Rules Apply to Me and What Court Will Apply Them? E-Commerce SEO Fellow mozzers, I’d like to start off my first Q&A post by answering a question posed by Will Critchlow from Distilled. He was working through the complicated intersection of U.S. copyright law and international law. More specifically, how does one know where a copyright infringement case is heard and what law is applied for violations involving partie... Read this post
